messages.content: I would like to go to England

Fantastic choice! England is incredible for travelers. I need to know which part of England interests you most:

🏙️ **Focus on One City** (Perfect for a deeper experience):
• **London** - The main hub with world-class attractions
• **Bath** - Georgian architecture and Roman baths  
• **York** - Medieval city with historic walls

🗺️ **Multi-City Adventure** (See more of the country):
• **Regional Tour**: 2-3 cities (perfect for 5-10 days)
• **Grand Tour**: Experience England comprehensively (10+ days)

🏘️ **Charming Small Towns & Villages**:
• **Cotswolds** - Honey-stone villages and countryside
• **Lake District** - Traditional villages with stunning lakes
• **Yorkshire Dales** - Historic market towns

Which approach sounds more appealing to you?
Perfect! A 7-day trip to England. What's your total budget?
Excellent! How many people will be traveling?
Great! 2 travelers for 7 days. Where will you be departing from? (City or airport)

Perfect! Departing from London. What type of accommodation do you prefer?

🏨 **Options:**
• **Hotel** - Full service with amenities
• **Boutique** - Unique, smaller properties
• **B&B** - Bed and breakfast, local charm
• **Hostel** - Budget-friendly, social atmosphere
• **Apartment** - Self-catering, like home
• **Any** - I'm flexible, show me options

Excellent choice! What's your preferred travel style?

✨ **Travel Styles:**
• **Luxury** - Premium experiences, finest accommodations
• **Mid-range** - Comfortable balance of quality and value
• **Budget** - Affordable options, maximize experiences
• **Mixed** - Splurge on some things, save on others

Perfect! What are you most interested in during your trip?

🎯 **Select your interests:**
• **History & Culture** - Museums, historic sites, local traditions
• **Food & Dining** - Local cuisine, restaurants, food tours
• **Nature & Outdoors** - Parks, hiking, scenic views
• **Nightlife & Entertainment** - Bars, clubs, shows, events
• **Shopping** - Markets, boutiques, souvenirs
• **Relaxation** - Spas, beaches, leisurely pace
• **Adventure** - Unique experiences, active pursuits

Just mention what appeals to you most!

Perfect! I have all the essential details:

🌍 **Destination:** England
📅 **Duration:** 7 days
💰 **Budget:** GBP2500
👥 **Travelers:** 2

I'm ready to create your personalized itinerary! Should I start generating your trip plan?

🚀 Excellent! I'm now generating your complete 7-day itinerary for England...

🏨 Finding perfect accommodation within your budget
🎯 Planning 7 full days with activities  
💰 Optimizing your GBP2500 budget
📍 Including detailed locations and timing

This will take just a moment!

🎉 **Your 7-day England itinerary is ready!**

🏨 **Hotel:** England Central Hotel - GBP196/night × 7 nights
📅 **All 7 days planned** with personalized activities matching your interests!
💰 **Total Budget:** GBP2500 (optimally allocated)
🎯 **Tailored to:** mid-range travel style, 2 travelers

Your complete day-by-day itinerary is now available in the preview! Each day includes perfectly timed activities, dining recommendations, and seamless transitions between experiences. ✨

conversationSummary:
Conversation context:
- Destination interest: England
- Budget: GBP2500
- Travel timeframe: 7 days
- Travelers: 2 adults
- Recent user requests: mid-range; history and food; yes
